nodes.text: Pla'atoh was a Weequay who lived on Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War. He had a shop on the Promenade, where he sold medium armor.
Pla'atoh was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. He appears on Nar Shaddaa as an medium armor vendor.
